meanings.definition: In a way that relates to or involves the use of computer technology.
meanings.sent1: She completed her homework digitally on the computer.
meanings.sent2: The movie was streamed digitally on the internet.
meanings.sent3: He tried to eat his breakfast digitally, but the toast got stuck in the CD drive.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed digitally through the virtual room.
meanings.sent5: The information was digitally encrypted for security purposes.

meanings.sent1: The alarm clock displayed the time digitally in bright red numbers.
meanings.sent2: The calculator helped him solve the math problem digitally.
meanings.sent3: The digitally painted mural added a modern touch to the classroom.
meanings.sent4: Her digitally enhanced vision allowed her to see details others missed.
meanings.sent5: The digitally printed tickets were easy to scan at the entrance.
